trans-unit.source: Defines a specialized text run that is used to mark the end of a line.
trans-unit.target: 定義特定文字執行，用來標記行結尾。

trans-unit.source: The text engine client can use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine> class to create a custom linebreak representation.
trans-unit.target: 文字引擎用戶端可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine>類別來建立自訂 linebreak 表示法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine" /> buffer.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine" /> class using a specified character length.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的字元長度，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine" /> buffer.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> value to use for the characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine" /> buffer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> 值，要用於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine" /> 緩衝區中的字元。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine" /> class using a specified character length and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的字元長度和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine" /> 值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine" /> character buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine" /> 字元緩衝區的參考。

trans-unit.source: Gets the character length of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine" /> character buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine" /> 字元緩衝區的字元長度。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> object that represents the length of the character buffer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 物件，表示字元緩衝區的長度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of properties shared by every text character of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine" /> character buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine" /> 字元緩衝區中每個文字字元所共用的屬性集。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> value that represents the properties shared by every text character.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> 值，表示每個文字字元共用的屬性。
